title: @THATFATRACOON, Where may i receive that beautiful sputnik bard 1?

replies.body:
Oh, woe.... woe am I friend, for I come bearing sad tidings.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

The 'Bardnik' icon was a special RU icon that we sold on NA only briefly earlier this year along with the Sakura icons from JP, and is not available on our Region anymore.

But geez, I gotta say I know that feel. Bard is my bro, and when I heard that it was RU exclusive I was kinda wrecked. You might get lucky and see another occasion where we bring it back to NA though, so keep your eyes open on the Store! ^^

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nlqFAUJE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-06T20:50:37.842+0000)
>
> Oh, woe.... woe am I friend, for I come bearing sad tidings.
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
> 
> The 'Bardnik' icon was a special RU icon that we sold on NA only briefly earlier this year along with the Sakura icons from JP, and is not available on our Region anymore.
> 
> But geez, I gotta say I know that feel. Bard is my bro, and when I heard that it was RU exclusive I was kinda wrecked. You might get lucky and see another occasion where we bring it back to NA though, so keep your eyes open on the Store! ^^

Space man redlink29 on duty!
